title: Impress the Murder Tribunal
content: f of our slaughter - before the Murder Tribunal, deep underneath Candulhallow's Tombstones. We have taken the serial killer Dolor's sick trophies - the hands of his victims. We can use these to access the Dread Lord's Tribunal underneath Candulhallow's Tombstones and find out how to enter the Temple of Bhaal. We killed Enver Gortash and pleased Orin the Red. She bid us bring his hand - proof of our slaughter - before the Murder Tribunal underneath Candulhallow's Tombstones. "Sicarius" will grant
